description:
Kosuda’s public confession of love leaves Yamada feeling flustered. And that’s before a super-handsome stranger sees her in a cheerleading outfit! Will Kosuda be shunned in the wake of this hunky new arrival?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: No! Non Così, di Fronte a Tutti... Non ho Mai Detto che ti Odio... Autunno - Scommettiamo sul Festival dello Sport! Fa` pure quello che vuoi... Autunno
Oh No! In Front of Everyone... I Never Said I Don`t Like You... Autumn. - Put Your Hopes in Field Day! Suit Yourself... Autumn.
Oh nein! Vor der ganzen Klasse …
Sonna! Minna no Miteru Mae de... Kirai Nante Ittenai jan... Aki / Taiikusai ni Kakero! Suki ni Sureba Ii jan... Aki
そんな! みんなの見てる前で... 嫌いなんて言ってないじゃん...秋 / 体育祭にかけろ! 好きにすればいいじゃん...秋
